name: Bubble Shooter DX (itch)
description:
Bubble Shooter Deluxe (DX) is a great classic bubble shoot game.

This addictive classic bubble blast match-three game comes with clean and modern graphics, hundreds of
great challenging levels and some nice special items for better game experience in harder levels.

How to Play:
1. Tap where you want the bubble (or hold and choose the direction).
2. Try to group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
3. Clear all bubbles to get to the next level.

Features:
- Clean, modern graphics
- 200+ levels (more soon)
- Three star ranking system
- Colorblind mode
- Special Bubbles for an improved gameplay on hard levels
- extra small download size

Thanks for playing and rating our Bubble game!
If you have problems, feel free and write us.
